      This function is used to enroll the user for SMS factor for new phone number(MFA through SMS) after deleting the previously enrolled SMS factor.

                                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        This function creates the client object to authenticate the Okta Domain with the authorization token.
        Parameters:
        oktaDomain - String oktaDomain is the url for Okta domain.
        oktaAuthToken - String oktaAuthToken is the authorization token of the Okta domain.
        Returns:
        Client for authentication.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                                         java.util.Map profiles)

        Parameters:
        client - com.okta.sdk.client.Client for authentication.
        profiles - Map user profile details in map which is updated.
        Returns:
        User contains user details like user id, status as:'STAGED' etc.

        Returns:

        newPassword - String newPassword of the user which needs to be updated to the user account.
        Returns:

                                                                              com.okta.sdk.resource.user.factor.Factor factor,
                                                                              java.lang.String OTP)
                                                                       throws java.lang.Exception

        client - com.okta.sdk.client.Client for authentication.
        user - com.okta.sdk.resource.user.User user for whom otp entered needs to be validated.
        OTP - String OTP entered by the user is needed for verification.
        Returns:
        VerifyFactorResponse contains details like factorResult,etc.

        java.lang.Exception

        client - com.okta.sdk.client.Client for authentication.
        userName - String userName of the user for authentication.

      • sendSmsChallenge

        static java.lang.String sendSmsChallenge(com.okta.sdk.client.Client client,
                                         java.lang.String auth,
                                         com.okta.sdk.resource.user.factor.Factor factorId)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        This function is used to send sms with OTP to the user when login credentials are successfully authenticated when multifator authentication is required for login by taking stateToken as input from the function authenticateUser().
        Parameters:
        client - com.okta.sdk.client.Client for authentication.
        auth - String contains stateToken from the authenticateUser() output.
        factorId - com.okta.sdk.resource.user.factor.Factor smsFactor id of the user.
        Returns:
        ExtensibleResource contains details like stateToken,status,etc.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • verifyMfa

        static java.lang.String verifyMfa(com.okta.sdk.client.Client client,
                                  com.okta.sdk.resource.user.User user,
                                  java.lang.String smsResult,
                                  com.okta.sdk.resource.user.factor.Factor factorId)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        This function is used to verify the OTP(from function sendSmsChallenge) entered by the user during MFA by taking stateToken as input from the function sendSmsChallenge().
        Parameters:
        client - com.okta.sdk.client.Client for authentication.
        user - com.okta.sdk.resource.user.User user for whom otp entered needs to be validated.
        smsResult - String contains stateToken from the sendSmsChallenge()function output.
        factorId - com.okta.sdk.resource.user.factor.Factor smsFactor id of the user
        Returns:
        ExtensibleResource contains details like sessionToken ,status: "SUCCESS",etc.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

                                       java.lang.String userName)
                                throws java.lang.Exception
        This function is used to send sms with otp to the user for authentication in case of forgot password
        Parameters:
        client - com.okta.sdk.client.Client for authentication.
        userName - String userName of the user for whom SMS needs to be sent for forgot password.
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • forgotPasswordVerifySms

        static java.lang.String forgotPasswordVerifySms(com.okta.sdk.client.Client client,
                                                java.lang.String stateToken,
                                                java.lang.String passCode)
                                         throws java.lang.Exception
        This function is used to verify the otp entered by the user in forgot password scenario.
        Parameters:
        client - com.okta.sdk.client.Client for authentication.
        stateToken - String stateToken which is required for OTP verification.
        passCode - String passCode is the OTP entered by the user for verification.
        Returns:
        ExtensibleResource contains details like stateToken etc.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • forgotPasswordRestPassword

        static java.lang.String forgotPasswordRestPassword(com.okta.sdk.client.Client client,
                                                   java.lang.String stateToken,
                                                   java.lang.String newPassword)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        This function is used to reset user's password after successful validation of OTP in forgot password.
        Parameters:
        client - com.okta.sdk.client.Client for authentication.
        stateToken - String stateToken from the function forgotPasswordVerifySms() output.
        newPassword - String newPassword of the user which needs to be updated to the user account.
        Returns:
        ExtensibleResource contains details like status,sessionToken,etc.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
